name: Portfolio
description: The portfolio is a simple website to show my work, skills, and information about me. I've done it in a minimalist format “That's one of my favorite formats of building websites”.

name: Kyden
description: I love fashion and I would like to see my future business as a clothing brand. Kyden is a demo of the website I would like to see. If you have any ideas about the design or the front of the website I am open to proposals.

name: IDMentor
description: IDMentor - getElementById ,but better. I didn't find something similar to that in Vs Code Extensions, so I decided to make my extension which helps you grab faster elements from HTML and create JS variables with selectors.

name: EasyBank
description: Easybank  is a simple landing page made with HTML CSS JS and gulp. I created it with my gulp starter. This is a learning page to train my stack skills. I hope you will like it.

name: RunSmart
description: RunSmart is a simple landing page made with HTML CSS JS. This is a learning page to train my stack skills. I hope you will like it.

name: Web-Developer
description: Web-Developer is a simple landing page made with HTML CSS JS GULP. I created it with my gulp starter. This is a learning page to train my stack skills. I hope you will like it.

name: IP Address Tracker
description: IP Address Tracker is a simple page made with HTML CSS JS GULP for learning working with APIS, MAPS and IFrames. I created it with my gulp starter. This is a learning page to train my stack skills. I hope you will like it.
